subtitle: I use these practical tools to deliver ERP operations, data quality, identity governance, and implementation workflows across projects.

items.name: Power BI
items.usage: Build KPI dashboards, trend analysis views, and operational scorecards for leadership reporting.

items.name: Excel
items.usage: Run validation formulas, reconciliation checks, and structured data review before publication.

items.name: Google Sheets
items.usage: Coordinate shared review queues and live status tracking with distributed teams.

items.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
items.usage: Support ERP-style workflows across admissions, reporting, identity alignment, and departmental process coordination.

items.name: SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL)
items.usage: Audit records, detect anomalies, and reconcile source-vs-target datasets with repeatable query templates.

items.name: MySQL Workbench
items.usage: Inspect schema structures, validate query outputs, and manage reporting datasets during analysis cycles.

items.name: Gradent Platform
items.usage: Extract admissions and academic processing exports for institutional data cleanup and reporting workflows.

items.name: Python
items.usage: Automate ETL, quality checks, reconciliation routines, and scheduled report generation tasks.

items.name: Bash
items.usage: Orchestrate repeatable execution steps, scheduled runs, and lightweight operational workflows.

items.name: GitHub
items.usage: Version script libraries, track workflow improvements, and publish reusable technical assets.

items.name: Microsoft Azure
items.usage: Apply cloud-connected identity, access control, and service governance patterns in lab and operational workflows.

items.name: Microsoft Entra ID
items.usage: Manage directory synchronization, access assignments, and identity lifecycle controls across distributed systems.

items.name: Windows Server
items.usage: Configure Active Directory, policy baselines, and lab-ready system administration environments.

items.name: Active Directory
items.usage: Manage user/group structures, access policy testing, and organizational unit setup in lab deployments.

items.name: VirtualBox & VMware
items.usage: Provision repeatable virtual labs for systems implementation, testing, and training delivery.

items.name: Cisco Packet Tracer
items.usage: Model VLAN, routing, and VPN scenarios before applying configurations in practical labs.

items.name: Managed Cisco Switches
items.usage: Practice trunking, segmentation, and troubleshooting for enterprise-style network workflows.

items.name: Biometric & CCTV Operations Stack
items.usage: Support exam integrity workflows through identity verification checks and monitored incident logging.

items.name: Microsoft 365 & Monday.com
items.usage: Coordinate implementation tasks, status tracking, stakeholder communication, and handover checkpoints across delivery cycles.

items.name: Issue & SLA Tracker (Excel/Google Sheets)
items.usage: Track incident queues, assign owners, monitor response timelines, and report service performance across operations cycles.

items.name: Deployment & UAT Checklists
items.usage: Coordinate pre-deployment validation, user acceptance testing, and go-live sign-off for systems updates.

items.name: Implementation Handover Playbooks
items.usage: Standardize transition notes, support escalation paths, and user guidance for stable post-rollout operations.
